mapper.select: select b.location, replace(substring(substring_index(c.xname, '/', 3), char_length(substring_index(c.xname, '/', 3-1)) + 1), '/', '') parent_component, -- 二级构件名称 c.id component_id, c.`name` component from soms.t_task_bridge_component tbc left join soms.t_bridge_component bc on tbc.bridge_component_id = bc.id left join soms.t_component c on bc.component_id = c.id left join soms.t_bridge b on bc.bridge_id = b.id where task_id = #{taskId} group by component_id

SELECT b.stake_or_truss_number as position, b.id FROM t_task_bridge_component tbc LEFT JOIN t_bridge_component bc ON tbc.bridge_component_id = bc.id LEFT JOIN t_bridge b ON bc.bridge_id = b.id WHERE tbc.task_id = #{taskId} AND bc.component_id = #{componentId}
